info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 04 at 3:11PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 345 PM MST... At 311 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Granite Reef Dam, or near Fountain Hills, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mesa, Fountain Hills, Saguaro Lake, Granite Reef Dam, Goldfield Ranch, Usery Mountain Park, Salt River Tubing Recreation Area and Fort McDowell. This includes AZ Route 87 between mile markers 185 and 201. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
